This could include frames crafted from sustainable wood, recycled plastics, or even plant-based materials, combined with a marketing campaign that emphasizes sustainability and responsibility.

This could be achieved through a simple app that lets users choose from a range of colors and designs, which would then be displayed on the lenses using a special film technology.
